subject: Regarding  Read-to-end functionality
body:
Hello all,
What is the highest kernel version allowed that supports the Insert+R for reading-to end of document windows etc? Is that only with say 2.6.20.x or 2.6.18, for example? 
Regards, --Keith, KeithNet Network Administrator
(You may reach me on Skype (but only when I'm on Windows XP)) By adding skypedude1234 to your Sype contact lists.
